description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is for all who find spirals mystical, perplexing and supreme.  Indulge yourself in a million different whorls with this amusement.  Impress your pals with screensaver mode (full version only).   Unveil swirly classifications, surprise and taunt all with your discoveries, and send cryptic codes to your Xbox buddies (full version only)!  Here's your chance to achieve digital knitter's utopia.
